profile.title: Cybersecurity Professional | Penetration Tester
profile.tagline: Securing the Digital World, One Vulnerability at a Time
profile.about: Cybersecurity Professional with hands-on penetration testing experience at Vimix Technologies and HackupTechnology. Skilled in identifying and mitigating OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities using Burp Suite, OWASP ZAP, Nmap, and SQLMap. Proven track record of conducting real-world VAPT on web applications and cloud environments, with strong expertise in exploit development, CTF challenges, and secure coding practices.
